   <script type="text/javascript">
    /* <![CDATA[ */
 for (var i=1; i<100; i++)
 {
 	animatedcollapse.addDiv('events'+i, 'fade=1')
 	animatedcollapse.addDiv('news'+i, 'fade=1')
 }
 
 animatedcollapse.ontoggle=function($, divobj, state){ //fires each time a DIV is expanded/contracted
 	//$: Access to jQuery
 	//divobj: DOM reference to DIV being expanded/ collapsed. Use "divobj.id" to get its ID
 	//state: "block" or "none", depending on state
 }
 animatedcollapse.init()
 /* ]]> */
   </script>

   </script>

   <link href="smooth_slider/custom.css" rel="stylesheet" type="text/css"/>
   <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.10.2/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="smooth_slider/jquery-slider.js" type="text/javascript">
    /*
 Full Page Slideshow- (c) Dynamic Drive DHTML code library (www.dynamicdrive.com)
 This notice MUST stay intact for legal use
 Visit Dynamic Drive at http://www.dynamicdrive.com/ for this script and 100s more
 */
   </script>
   <script type="text/javascript">
    $(function() {
 	$('#resume').on('click', function(){ // set up resume button behavior
 	$("#pan_area").smoothslider("resume") // resume playing of this slideshow. Pass in "pause" to pause it instead
 	$(this).hide() // hide resume button
 })
 		
 $("#pan_area").smoothslider("install", {
 	// either "playlist" or "playlist_url" must be specified.
 
 	// "playlist" is a list of dictionaries. Each dictionary specifies the necessary information
 	// to display one image and it can have the following fields:
 	//    "url" - url of the image
 	//    "caption" - a text to pass to the on_image_change when the given image is going
 	//                to be displayed
 	//    "slide" - specifies how the sliding should occur. It's a dictionary with the
 	//                following values:
 	//         "x1" - initial x position. The range is 0 ... image width
 	//         "x2" - final x position. The range is 0 ... image width
 	//         "y1" - initial y position. The range is 0 ... image height
 	//         "y2" - final y position. The range is 0 ... image height
 	//         "z1" - initial zoom. It should be >= 1
 	//         "z2" - final zoom. It should be >= 1
 	//         "hint" -  can be one of:
 	//              "zoom" - zoom
 	//              "hpan" - pan horizontally
 	//              "vpan" - pan vertically
 	//
 	//         When the browser has limited support, the plugin will only perform 
 	//         one motion (horizontal/vertical panning or zooming).
 	//         If "hint" is used, then the specified motion is used instead.
 	//         If "slide" is not specified, then a random motion is used
 	//         If "slide" has an empty dictionary, then no motion is performed
 
 	// "playlist_url" is a url of a json file which specifies among other things
 	// a playlist. Besides that, it can also contain some parameters,
 	// which if specified, will override the ones specified when calling smoothslider.
 	// Besides the playlist, the parameters that can be specified in the json file are:
 	// 
 	// "preload_images", "anim_fps", "transition_time", "hold_time", "loops"
 			
 	"playlist":[
 
 {"url":"gallery/MonksRec/Image2.jpg","slide":{}},
 {"url":"gallery/MonksRec/Image3.jpg","slide":{}},
 {"url":"gallery/MonksRec/Image4.jpg","slide":{}}
 	],
 
 //	"loops":2, // play everything twice and then pause. If not specified, the slider will play indefinitely
 	
 	"hold_time":4,
 	"transition_time":2,
 
 // this function gets called whenever there's an image change
 	"on_image_change":function(caption, image_url) { 
 			var area= $("#img_msg_area").find("span");
 			area.animate({"opacity": 0}, 500, "swing", function() {
 				area.text(caption);
 				area.animate({"opacity": 1}, 500); // fade in & out take 500ms each
 			});
 		},
 	"throbber":$("#throbber"), // an image to show when waiting for images to load
 	on_pause:function(){
 		$('#resume').show()
 	}
 
 	});
 });
   </script>
   <script src="http://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.4.2/jquery.min.js" type="text/javascript">
   </script>
   <script src="js/jquery.magnifier.js" type="text/javascript">
    /* was 1.3.2

 Visit Dynamic Drive at http://www.dynamicdrive.com/ for this script and 100s more
 
 Edit jquery.magnifier.js to change the border of the magnified image.
 
 This module likes to go last in the head or it may not work!
 
 */
   </script>

   <div id="headline">
    <div class="container">
     <p>
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div id="title">
    <div class="container">
     <h1>
      Lancing Parish Council
     </h1>
    </div>
   </div>
   <div id="section1">
    <div class="container">
     <!--[if lte IE 8]>         
 	<div class="msgstyle3">You are using an obsolete browser that is not supported by this website. 
 		If the menu system does not work you can navigate the site using the sitemap shown at the base of every page.</div>      
 <![endif]-->
     <h2>
      Welcome
     </h2>
     <div class="panel-left">
      <p>
       Lancing Parish Council was set up in 1894. It covers the area between Shoreham-by-sea and Worthing from Western Road (adjacent to Brooklands) and Sompting in the west through to the River Adur in the east. It stretches from the beach and coast inland to include part of the South Downs.
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
       Working in partnership with the local community  to make Lancing a great place to live, work, visit and enjoy.
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <div class="handheld-hidden">
       <div class="float_left">
        <img alt="" class="rounded magnify" height="119" src="/files/1/lancing1.jpg" width="180"/>
       </div>
       <div class="float_left">
        <img alt="" class="rounded magnify" height="119" src="/files/1/lancing2.jpg" width="180"/>
       </div>
       <div class="float_left">
        <img alt="" class="rounded magnify" height="119" src="/files/1/lancing3.jpg" width="180"/>
       </div>
      </div>
      <div class="clear">
      </div>
      <p>
      </p>
      <h4>
       Monks Rec Consultation
      </h4>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
       Lancing Parish Council, together with many community groups, has been working towards the Monks Rec Improvement Project. Those involved include Keep Lancing Lovely, Lancing Community Bike Project, Lancing Football Club, Lancing Parish Youth Council, Lancing United Football Club, Lancing Youth Football Club, Sussex County Football Association, The Globe Primary School, West Sussex County Council, Worthing &amp; Horsham District Sunday Football League and local experts.
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
       A survey was conducted locally in August 2017 to find out what Lancing residents want at Monks Rec. Since then, the working group has created a brief and conceptual design based on the results. A consultation was held in spring 2018, ending April 2018. The results can be found
       <a class="filelink" href="/files/122/Monks%20Rec%20Consultation%20Results%202018.pdf" onclick="target='_blank';">
        here
       </a>
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <p>
       <b>
        Additional information can be found
        <a class="ext" href="monks_rec.asp" onclick="target='_blank';">
         here
        </a>
       </b>
      </p>
      <p>
      </p>
      <div class="slideshowwrapper">
       <div id="throbber">
        <img alt="" src="smooth_slider/throbber.gif"/>
       </div>
       <div id="resume" style="display:none">
        resume
       </div>
       <div id="pan_area">
       </div>
       <div id="img_msg_area">
        <span>
        </span>
       </div>
       <div id="static_text_area">
       </div>
       <div id="pause">
        <a href="#nogo" onclick="javascript:$('#pan_area').smoothslider('pause')">
         pause at end of current frame animation
        </a>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>

       <h3>
        Latest News
       </h3>
       <p>
       </p>
       <h5>
        Notice Of Intent to Co-opt - Mash Barn Ward Casual Vacancy
        <br/>
        <span>
         27th July 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="/files/attachments/news/co-option notice.pdf" onclick='target="_blank"' title="View the original document">
         <img alt="" src="/admin/images/filetypes/pdf.gif"/>
        </a>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Please click on the link to view further details of the above notice.
       </p>
       <div class="clear hr">
       </div>
       <p>
       </p>
       <h5>
        LEVEL 3 HEAT WARNING ISSUED TO WEST SUSSEX RESIDENTS BY WEST SUSSEX COUNTY COUNCIL
        <br/>
        <span>
         19th July 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="/files/attachments/news/top ten tips keeping cool in hot weather.pdf" onclick='target="_blank"' title="View the original document">
         <img alt="" src="/admin/images/filetypes/pdf.gif"/>
        </a>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        As we continue to experience prolonged spell of hot weather and with heatwave conditions continuing the Met Office have issued a Level 2 Heat Health Watch with a 70% probability of heatwave conditions between 0000 on Friday 20/07/18 and 6pm on Tuesday 24/07/18.   On Friday; there is a chance of some heavy and thundery downpours developing brought on by the humidity, Maximum temperature 29 Â°C.
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Please  click on the link to view helpful tips for keeping cool in the current heatwave and
        <a class="ext" href="http://www.westsussexwellbeing.org.uk/topics/more-topics/summer-health" onclick="target='_blank';">
         here
        </a>
        for further information
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <div class="clear hr">
       </div>
       <p>
       </p>
       <h5>
        GRANT AID APPLICATIONS 2018
        <br/>
        <span>
         17th July 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Don't forget to submit your Grant Aid Applications for this year before Friday 31 August.
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Further details and the application form can be accessed by clicking on the "Our Council" heading on the front page, then "Details of Grant Applications".
       </p>
       <div class="clear hr">
       </div>
       <p>
       </p>
       <h5>
        BATHING NEWSLETTER JULY 2018  PUBLISHED BY DEFRA
        <br/>
        <span>
         12th July 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="/files/attachments/news/bathing water newsletter july 2018.pdf" onclick='target="_blank"' title="View the original document">
         <img alt="" src="/admin/images/filetypes/pdf.gif"/>
        </a>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Please click on link to access the above newsletter which is produced twice each year by the Department of Environment, Farming and Rural Affairs.
       </p>
      </div>
      <!-- end of container -->

       <h5>
        Keep Lancing Lovely - Monthly Litter Picks -2018
        <br/>
        <span>
         29th July 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="/files/attachments/events/klldoc050118-0001.pdf" onclick='target="_blank"' title="View the original document">
         <img alt="" src="/admin/images/filetypes/pdf.gif"/>
        </a>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Please click  on the link to view the dates for this year's litter picking Sunday mornings.
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Please ensure that you are wearing stout footwear
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        All the best to you!
       </p>
       <p>

       <h5>
        Lancing Indoor Market  on Tuesday Mornings 9 am - 12.15pm
        <br/>
        <span>
         7th August 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        <a href="/files/attachments/events/doc190917-0001.pdf" onclick='target="_blank"' title="View the original document">
         <img alt="" src="/admin/images/filetypes/pdf.gif"/>
        </a>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Please click on the link to view the poster for the above Tuesday Market held in the Jubilee Hall.
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        The next market is on Tuesday 7 August.  There is no market on Tuesday 31 July  as the NHS Blood Donation Team will be at the hall.
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <div class="clear hr">
       </div>
       <p>

       <h5>
        Sussex Keyboard and Organ Club Concert on Thursday 16 August 2018
        <br/>
        <span>
         16th August 2018
        </span>
       </h5>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Attention all Music Lovers - Sussex Keyboard and Organ Club will be performing at 7.15 pm on Thursday 16 August 2018
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
       </p>
